title: Welcome to Cape Conran

abstract: A beautiful environment and a great place to live. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from East Gippsland'.
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to live and work in a National Park? Cape Conran Coastal Park consists of 11,700 hectares of pristine coastal wilderness. Meet Carla and Josh Puglisi who manage the park as well as Mike Irvine; the park ranger, as they talk about the importance of protecting the coastal environment, the rich indigenous history of the area as well as what it's like living within and raising families in such a beautiful place.
